scripts.install: npm run install:webapp && npm run install:service  && npm run install:samples
scripts.install:webapp: echo Installing Webapp dependencies && cd ./src/webapp && npm i
scripts.install:service: echo Installing Service dependencies && cd ./src/service/ && npm i
scripts.install:samples: echo Installing Samples dependencies && cd ./src/samples && npm i
scripts.lint: yamllint data/**/*.yaml && npm --prefix ./src/webapp/ run lint && npm --prefix ./src/service/ run lint
scripts.test: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=test npm run test-ava
scripts.test-light: npm run lint && cross-env NODE_ENV=test-light npm run test-ava
